statements: SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_information;
SELECT consultation_id, billed_amount FROM billing_and_payment_information WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_information ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, billed_amount FROM billing_and_payment_information WHERE billed_amount > 100 ORDER BY billed_amount ASC;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, healthcare_professional_id FROM billing_and_payment_information WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_information WHERE billed_amount > 1000 ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, billed_amount, payment_status FROM billing_and_payment_information WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY billed_amount ASC;
SELECT patient_id, healthcare_professional_id, billed_amount FROM billing_and_payment_information WHERE billed_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY healthcare_professional_id, consultation_date DESC;
SELECT consultation_date, billed_amount FROM billing_and_payment_information WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' AND billed_amount < 500 ORDER BY consultation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM billing_and_payment_information WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' AND healthcare_professional_id = 1001 ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT consultation_id, total_amount, patient_id FROM billing_info WHERE consultation_date = '2022-04-12';
SELECT * FROM payment_info WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payment_info WHERE payment_id = 5 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, total_amount FROM billing_info WHERE consultation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND consultation_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM billing_info
SELECT patient_id, total_amount FROM billing_info ORDER BY consultation_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payment_info WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, total_amount AS amount FROM billing_info JOIN payment_info ON billing_info.consultation_id = payment_info.consultation_id
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE consultation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY consultation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT bill_id, consultation_date, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE consultation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_amount >= 1000;
SELECT professional_id, professional_name, specialty, consultation_fee FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, consultation_date, consultation_time, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE consultation_time BETWEEN '10:00:00' AND '14:00:00';
SELECT * FROM billing_information ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE consultation_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT patient_id, consultation_date, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, bill_id, payment_amount FROM payment_information WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT professional_name, specialty, consultation_fee FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT patient_id, consultation_date, total_amount FROM billing_info WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT professional_name, specialty FROM healthcare_professionals ORDER BY professional_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT billing_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payment_history WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT professional_name, specialty, contact_number FROM healthcare_professionals WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY professional_name;
SELECT payment_id, amount_paid, payment_method FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM billing_info INNER JOIN patients ON billing_info.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.gender = 'M' ORDER BY billing_info.consultation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM doctor_info LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, speciality FROM doctor_info WHERE hospital='Hospital ABC';
SELECT p.patient_name, b.amount, py.payment_method FROM patient_info p JOIN billing_info b ON p.patient_id = b.patient_id JOIN payment_info py ON b.billing_id = py.billing_id;

SELECT d.doctor_name, c.consultation_date, c.consultation_type FROM doctor_info d JOIN consultation_info c ON d.doctor_id = c.doctor_id WHERE c.consultation_type='Checkup' ORDER BY c.consultation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_info;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, speciality, hospital FROM doctor_info WHERE speciality = 'Cardiology';
SELECT consultation_date, consultation_type FROM consultation_info WHERE consultation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY consultation_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, amount, payment_date FROM patient_info JOIN billing_info ON patient_info.patient_id = billing_info.patient_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
